summary:
Male and Female 4K Textures for Argonian Race.

Compressed and Uncompressed Versions to pick from.
descriptionHtml:
Argonians are now High Res.

This mod adds Male and Female 4K Textures for Argonian Head, Feet, Hands and Bodies.

____________________________________ Installation+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Programfiles(x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data          FOR 64-bit users
You can find the Skyrim folder here: Programfiles\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data                 FOR 32-bit users

Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalebody.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalebody_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalehands.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalehands_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalehead.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalehead_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalebody.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalebody_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalehands.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalehands_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalehead.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalehead_msn.dds

Requirements: Skyrim.

Mods to try with this
Animated Dragon Wings by [b]Anton[/b] [url]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/?[/url]

83Willows WHITER TEETH 4all - Orc Khajiit Argonian Werewolf by [b]83Willow [/b][url]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11371/?[/url]

Dread Tentacles - HDT Enabled Hair for Argonians by [b]ClarkWasHere [url]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54586/?[/url]

[/b]Argonian Snake Eyes by [b]Drachis [url]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/830/?[/url]

[/b]Argonian Fins by [b]Chilean Wolf[/b] [url]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55707/?[/url]

For the people that would like to delete this mod
____________________________________ UnInstallation+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Just go to your data folder and delete the following files
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalebody.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalebody_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalehands.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalehands_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalehead.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianfemale\argonianfemalehead_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalebody.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalebody_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalehands.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalehands_msn.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalehead.dds
Data\textures\actors\character\argonianmale\argonianmalehead_msn.dds

If anyone has any questions or thoughts leave a comment.

Credits:
Krypt

Tools:
Gimp

Enjoy

If you like the mod don't forget to endorse.
